name: 徐元瑛
objective: １.電腦網路概述與網路階層結構２.路由與交換技術與協定 ３.錯誤、流量與擁塞控制 ４.媒體存取控制 ５.區域網路技術與應用６.網際網路協定與標準７.網路互連技術８.網路機制效能評估
schedule:
W1	Overview
W2	Computer Networks and the Internet
W3	Computer Networks and the Internet
W4	Application Layer
W5	Application Layer
W6	Transport Layer
W7	Transport Layer
W8	Transport Layer
W9	Midterm
W10	Network Layer
W11	Network Layer
W12	Network Layer
W13	Link Layer
W14	Link Layer
W15	Wireless and Mobile Networks
W16	Wireless and Mobile Networks
W17	Wireless and Mobile Networks
W18	Final exam
scorePolicy:
1.	Midterm exam: 30%
2.	Final exam: 30%
3.	Quiz and course presence: 20%
4.	Labs: 20%
materials:
Text book: 
James F. Kurose, Keith W. Ross, “Computer Networking, A Top-Down Approach, Fifth Edition” Pearson, 2009
